name: BNNS.LossReduction
desc: An enumeration that describes loss reduction functions.

items.name: case none
items.desc: Returns the loss without any reduction.

items.name: case reductionMean
items.desc: Sums the loss of all samples in the batch and divides by the number of samples.

items.name: case sum
items.desc: Sums the loss of all samples in the batch.

items.name: case weightedMean
items.desc: Sums the loss of all samples in the batch and divides by the sum of all weights.

items.name: case zeroWeightMean
items.desc: Sums the loss of all samples in the batch and divides by the number of non-zero weights.

items.name: var bnnsLossReductionFunction: BNNSLossReductionFunction
items.desc: The underlying loss reduction function structure.
